contentList.content: Way of the Hadal Soul
Steel your soul and venture into its depths.
Lesser Minds

Your brain has grown ears, or at least that's what it feels like. You may wiggle them with a Ki Point, casting Detect Thoughts and granting yourself Advantage on Insight Checks against creatures with lower Intelligence than you.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Insight <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Checks</LSTag> against creatures with lower <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> than you.
Lesser Minds

Your brain has grown ears, or at least that's what it feels like. You may wiggle them with a Ki Point, casting Detect Thoughts and granting yourself Advantage on Insight Checks against creatures with lower Intelligence than you.
Aura of the Depths

"It's like a smell, but in your head." That's how people describe your deeply (get it?) unsettling aura. Creatures other than you within [1] that you are not allied with become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Psychic Damage.
This creature has had its mental defences reduced, and is <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Psychic Damage.
Undertow
Your strikes instill the chill and pressure of the deep. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Stranglemind
Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

"The mind has to wrap around the neck."

-Michael "Scranton Strangler" Scott
Alien Intellect

You are forever touched by the inscrutable depths, making it hard for normies to comprehend your movements and physical form. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 10 plus your Intelligence and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic and Cold Damage.

You are forever touched by the inscrutable depths, making it hard for normies to comprehend your movements and physical form. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 11 plus your Intelligence and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Psychic and Cold Damage.
Sonar's Reach
Your body is able to move farther and more efficiently due to its enhanced sonar-like proprioception, increasing your Unarmed Melee Attack range by [1].
Aphotic Eyes

Whoever coined the term "their eyes lit up" has never met you. You spent so long in the dark, your eyes absorb light and sound like a black hole. You gain the ability to see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures up to [1] away.
Cold Shock Syndrome

The hadal temperatures you're used to are cold enough to stop weaker landlubbers' hearts. When you bring a creature down to fewer than [2] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it dies and all nearby creatures take [1].
The Bends
not the radiohead album
Flurry of Madness and Mayhem
Punch twice in quick succession, and let your unsettling aura possibly inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Madness</LSTag> in your target.
